template.name: Viper Fragment (LCE)
template.description: It creates a Viper-managed Fragment with LCE pattern implementation.

parameter.name: Fragment name
parameter.help: The name of the Viper-managed Fragment class to create

parameter.name: Create ViewHelper for advanced Android transitions?
parameter.help: Create ViewHelper that allows Routing accessing Fragment android.Views to allow Routing perform advanced transitions.

parameter.name: Enable ViewState handling
parameter.help: Add ViewState handling by inheriting from Mosby-based LceViewStateFragment.

parameter.name: ContentView
parameter.help: Provide the type of your ContentView. It has to inherit from android.View.
